data: The landscape shows many shades of green; deep forests, mostly coniferous, extend from the valley of the Rednitz to that of the Tauber.
valley of the Rednitz | valley of the Tauber
Wassermann, Jakob, 1873-1934; Lewisohn, Ludwig, 1882-1955 [Translator]; Porterfield, Allen Wilson, 1877-1952 [Translator]
